TopicTitle: Craft still treated as landed after lifting off from Mun

Articles.Content:
Landed a belly lander on the Mun, when I take off the game will not show trajectory, AP/PE, and puts craft in a dead stop when timewarping/returning to craft from tracking station. Effect always occurs when reloading from save on munar surface.

If I EVA a kerbal while the lander is in flight he will smash through the pod and fuel tank then be at matched speed with the newly formed debris formation.

The lander i experienced the effect with.
I have KSP2 version 0.1.0.0.0.20892 installed on Windows 10 , Intel i5 6400, 12 GB Ram, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 Super
Encountered the same thing, restarting the game seemed to fix it
